text: Lambert Lake is a village in unincorporated Lambert Lake Township, Washington County, Maine, United States. The community is located along Maine State Route 6 north-northwest of Calais. Lambert Lake had a post office until October 24, 1987; it still has its own ZIP code, 04454. The Eastern Maine Railway passes through the village of Lambert Lake. ==References== Category:Villages in Washington County, Maine Category:Villages in Maine
title: Lambert Lake, Maine
